target_name: 개도국 특히, 최빈개도국의 농업 생산역량 강화를 위해 국제협력 증진을 통해 농촌 지역 사회기반시설, 농업 연구 및 지원 서비스, 기술 개발, 식물 및 가축 유전자은행에 대한 투자 확대
computation_definitions:
데이터 이용 제한(4유형)
현재 이용할 수 있는 국내통계, 국제기구통계, 국내유사통계가 없습니다.
1유형, 2유형, 3유형에 속하나 일시적으로 서비스가 되지 않는 경우도 포함됩니다.
indicator_definition: 개발도상국 농업부문에 제공한 공적개발원조(ODA)와 기타 공적지원금 지출총액임
un_custodian_agency: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
source_organisation_1: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)

en.target_name: Increase investment, including through enhanced international cooperation, in rural infrastructure, agricultural research and extension services, technology development and plant and livestock gene banks in order to enhance agricultural productive capacity in developing countries, in particular least developed countries
en.computation_definitions:
Data unavailable (Type4)
There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
en.indicator_name: Total official flows (official development assistance plus other official flows) to the agriculture sector
en.indicator_definition: Gross disbursements of total ODA and other official flows to the agriculture sector of developing countries.
en.global_indicator_name: Total official flows (official development assistance plus other official flows) to the agriculture sector
en.un_custodian_agency: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
en.title: Untitled
en.source_organisation_1: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
